title: Ford Feels the Heat at the Nürburgring (World Endurance Championship) | FORD PERFORMANCE
description: The Ford Chip Ganassi Racing team had a tough weekend at the Nürburgring and ultimately had to settle for fourth place for the #66 Ford GT of Stefan Mücke and Olivier Pla and seventh for the #67 car of Marino Franchitti, Andy Priaulx and Harry Tincknell. Here’s how the race unfolded.
tags: Ford GT, World Endurance Championship, Ford Performance, Nurburgring, WEC, Ford GT racing

asset.title: Ford Feels the Heat at the Nürburgring (World Endurance Championship) | FORD PERFORMANCE
asset.description:
The Ford Chip Ganassi Racing team had a tough weekend at the Nürburgring and ultimately had to settle for fourth place for the #66 Ford GT of Stefan Mücke and Olivier Pla and seventh for the #67 car of Marino Franchitti, Andy Priaulx and Harry Tincknell. Here’s how the race unfolded.
